purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 5th LATAM School in Software Engineering Research, which will take place from September 22 to 26, 2025, in Recife, Brazil. It invites students and young researchers from Latin American institutions to apply for this opportunity to learn about careers in Software Engineering research. The school aims to help new researchers integrate into the software engineering community, providing mentoring, keynotes, and panel discussions. Applications are open until June 30, 2025, and selected participants will receive benefits such as free registration and potential financial support.

evidence_sentences: It is a great pleasure to invite students and young researchers to apply for this exceptional opportunity to learn about the possibilities to pursue a career in Software Engineering (SE) research.

We invite applications for the 5th Latin American School of SE, an in-person event co-located with the Brazilian Conference on Software: Practice and Theory (CBSoft 2025), which will take place in Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil, from September 22 to 26, 2025.
The main goal of the 5th edition of the LATAM school is to help new and future Software Engineering (SE) researchers become part of the larger software engineering community.
The school will enable participants to explore potential pathways and gain a deeper understanding of the challenges and opportunities in SE research.
There are **limited spots** (maximum of 50 students) to be filled for this school that will be given to Latin American applicants.
How to apply? You need to provide the following documents: A structured abstract of your research with the headings: Context/Problem, Aims, Method, and Results (Expected Results), written in English.
Benefits for selected participants: Free registration for the School (including lunch and coffee break).
Some participants may receive financial support to attend the event, subject to available funding.
